p1: In the table, "-" represents an undefined value.
p2: In the table, "..." indicates that there are other common properties or events. For more details, you can refer to the React JSX type hints.
p3: If the component properties above do not achieve the desired effect, you can use a combination of <0>className</0>, <1>style</1>, <2>slot</2>, and custom JS logic to accomplish it.
p4: If the use case requires a high level of complexity, you might consider forking a copy, rebuilding it, or looking for a better third-party library or alternative solution.
p5: If you have a better implementation approach or other questions, feel free to submit an <0>issue</0>.
